meanings.definition: A thing offered, especially as a gift or contribution.
meanings.sent1: She placed the beautiful offering on the altar.
meanings.sent2: The charity event received a generous offering from the community.
meanings.sent3: The cat left a small offering of a dead mouse at the doorstep.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an offering of kindness to everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bouquet was an offering of love and appreciation.

meanings.definition: The act of making an offer or proposal.
meanings.sent1: His offering to help with the project was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The company made a competitive offering to secure the deal.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made an offering of acorns to join the bird's nest-building competition.
meanings.sent4: Her suggestion was an offering of a fresh perspective on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The team's proposal was an offering of collaboration and teamwork.

meanings.definition: A religious act of giving to a deity.
meanings.sent1: The priest performed the ritualistic offering at the temple.
meanings.sent2: The devotees made their daily offering at the shrine.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made an offering of nuts to the squirrel god.
meanings.sent4: The incense wafted up as an offering to the heavens.
meanings.sent5: The ceremonial dance was an offering of worship and devotion.
